name: Gladiator MMXVI
description:
Our attempt at the first GMS:2 Game Jam, BetaJam.

Download the .zip file and use the .exe in the project folder to play as there is a problem with the standalone .exe file.

Play as a gladiator trapped in an arena fighting for his life against endless waves of oncoming Orcs. Select the weapon of your choice and see how many rounds you can survive.

View the controls in game by pressing 'P'.
